footer.companyDescription: Your trusted source for quality reconditioned cars with a low 3% processing fee in Malaysia.
home.stageDescription: Experience our best selling car models
home.purchaseDescription: From dream to driveway - we make car buying simple and stress-free.
home.purchaseStep1Desc: Browse our premium reconditioned vehicle list and choose your dream car.
home.purchaseStep2Desc: Once confirmed, we secure your car with transparent pricing and no hidden fees.
home.purchaseStep3Desc: Manage shipping arrangements to safely deliver your vehicle to Malaysia.
home.purchaseStep4Desc: All customs paperwork managed by our experts
home.purchaseStep5Desc: Vehicle is fully inspected to meet safety and quality standards before delivery.
home.purchaseStep6Desc: Your car arrives at Vicar Malaysia, ready for you to begin your journey.
home.rentalDescription: Drive the car of your dreams without the commitment. Simple, flexible, and hassle-free.
home.rentalStep1Desc: Pick from our premium fleet of vehicles - from luxury sedans to spacious SUVs, we have something for every occasion.
home.rentalStep2Desc: Select your dates, choose your vehicle, and confirm your booking in just a few clicks. No complicated paperwork.
home.rentalStep3Desc: Visit our location, complete a quick check-in, and you're ready to explore. It's that simple!
home.newArrivalsSubtitle: Premium vehicles available for rental and chauffeur services
home.exploreMalaysiaSubtitle: Discover premium chauffeur services connecting Malaysia's most vibrant cities
home.contactUsDownload: Contact Us or Download Vicar App Now!
home.appDescription: Whether you need a one-way trip, hourly chauffeur service, airport transfers, or have a special event requiring luxury transportation, our professional chauffeurs and premium fleet are ready to provide you with an exceptional experience.
service.heroSubtitle: Your all in one Premium Mobility Ecosystem
service.reconCarDesc: Discover our curated selection of pre-owned luxury vehicles. Each car in our inventory undergoes a rigorous inspection process to ensure it meets our exacting standards of quality and performance. From classic models to the latest releases, we offer a diverse range of options to suit every preference and budget.
service.carRentalDesc: Experience luxury without the commitment. Our premium car rental service offers access to an extensive fleet of high-end vehicles for short-term use. Whether you need a car for a business trip, special occasion, or simply want to experience driving a luxury vehicle, we provide flexible rental options with exceptional service.
service.maintenanceDesc: Keep your luxury vehicle in peak condition with our comprehensive maintenance and service offerings. Our team of certified technicians specializes in high-end vehicles and uses only genuine parts and state-of-the-art diagnostic equipment. From routine maintenance to complex repairs, we ensure your car receives the care it deserves.
service.ctaSubtitle: Get in touch with our team today to discuss your automotive needs and discover how we can help you find the perfect luxury vehicle.
serviceDetails.reconCarSubtitle: Discover Our Premium Pre-Owned Luxury Vehicles
serviceDetails.reconCarDesc: Our reconditioned car service offers a carefully curated selection of pre-owned luxury vehicles that have undergone rigorous inspection and quality assurance processes. Each vehicle in our inventory is handpicked to meet our exacting standards.
serviceDetails.carRentalDesc: Our premium car rental service provides access to an extensive fleet of high-end vehicles for short-term use. Whether for business, special occasions, or simply experiencing luxury driving, we offer flexible rental options.
serviceDetails.maintenanceSubtitle: Keep Your Luxury Vehicle in Peak Condition
serviceDetails.maintenanceDesc: Our comprehensive maintenance and service offerings ensure your luxury vehicle receives the care it deserves. Our certified technicians specialize in high-end vehicles using genuine parts and state-of-the-art equipment.
serviceDetails.qualityAssuredDesc: Every service we provide meets the highest standards of quality and excellence.
serviceDetails.expertSupportDesc: Our team of professionals is always ready to assist you with any questions or concerns.
serviceDetails.flexibleSchedulingDesc: We work around your schedule to provide convenient service times.
tools.heroDescription: Welcome to Vicar's helpful tools section. Choose a tool from the navigation to get started with your car buying journey.
tools.insuranceEstimatorDesc: Get accurate insurance estimates for your vehicle. Our tool helps you understand the costs and coverage options available for your car.
tools.insuranceComingSoonDesc: This feature will be available in the next update.
tools.loanCheckerDesc: Check your loan eligibility and get pre-approved financing options. Our loan checker helps you understand your borrowing capacity and terms.
tools.documentChecklistDesc: Complete checklist of documents and items you need to prepare for your car purchase. Stay organized and ensure a smooth buying process.
tools.carRecommendationDesc: Find your perfect car match based on your preferences, budget, and needs. Our AI-powered recommendation system suggests the best vehicles for you.
tools.carRecommendationComingSoonDesc: This feature will be available in the next update.
tools.checklistTitle: Documents & Items the Buyer Needs to Prepare
tools.nric: Original NRIC (IC) ‚Äì For JPJ registration and loan application
tools.drivingLicense: Driving Licence ‚Äì Sometimes requested by dealer for record
tools.proofOfAddress: Proof of Address ‚Äì Utility bill or bank statement (for bank & JPJ record)
tools.loanDownpayment: Loan Downpayment ‚Äì As agreed with dealer/bank
tools.insurancePayment: Insurance Payment ‚Äì Full amount for first-year coverage (or proof of transfer from another car)
tools.processingFeeTitle: Just 3% processing fee ‚Äì lowest in Malaysia!
tools.processingFeeDesc: At Vicar, we offer the most competitive processing fees in the market. Save more on your car purchase with our transparent and affordable rates.
tools.insuranceEstimatorOverview: Get insurance estimates for your vehicle
tools.loanCheckerOverview: Check your loan eligibility and options

about.heroSubtitle: Driving Your Dreams, One Luxury Car at a Time
about.storyText:
Vicar's story began in Penang 13 years ago with a clear goal: to make car buying honest and easy. In a market clouded by hidden costs and uncertainty, we built our business on trust‚Äîcharging only a fair 3% fee for every purchase, whether cash or loan. With the Vicar App, customers can now access the latest arrivals instantly, making car buying simple, transparent, and future-ready.

Our journey doesn't end with recon cars. Today, Vicar also offers car rental and professional servicing, giving customers a complete automotive experience. From purchase to aftercare, every step is guided by trust, transparency, and reliability.
about.missionText: To deliver premium mobility experiences through exceptional service, professional chauffeurs, high-quality vehicles, and seamless digital access.
about.visionText: To become Asia's most trusted and recognised premium mobility ecosystem ‚Äî connecting luxury travel, chauffeur services, and automotive ownership into one unified global brand.
about.tagline2: THAT'S THE KLASS WORTH [ KW ] PROMISE
about.gradientBar1: 99% Confidence, 99% of High Quality, 99% Transparency, 99% Satisfaction
about.whyChooseSubtitle: From selection to delivery, every part of our system is designed to make recon car buying simple, transparent, and reliable.
about.feature1Desc: Only carefully selected vehicles make it to our platform. Every car goes through a multi-point inspection before being listed.
about.feature2Desc: What you see is what you get. All listings include detailed specifications, true condition reports, and actual vehicle images.
about.feature3Desc: View, compare, and reserve vehicles instantly through our website or app. No guesswork. No pressure.
about.feature4Desc: All prices are upfront and honest. What you see is what you pay ‚Äî no surprises.
about.feature5Desc: We're here to help at every step ‚Äî online, offline, and even after you drive away.
about.feature6Desc: We don't just recondition. We restore value, trust, and long-term peace of mind.
about.ctaSubtitle: Explore our collection or get in touch with our team today. Your dream car awaits.
brandStory.introText: ViCAR delivers exceptional premium mobility experiences, combining luxury, innovation, and personalized service to create unforgettable journeys. Built on five core principles ‚Äî V ¬∑ i ¬∑ C ¬∑ A ¬∑ R ‚Äî our brand represents a steadfast commitment to excellence, quality, and unparalleled customer satisfaction in every journey we undertake together.
brandStory.vDescription: Vehicle represents our comprehensive automotive ecosystem. From today's innovations to tomorrow's mobility solutions, ViCAR continuously expands its service offerings to meet evolving transportation needs.
brandStory.vFooter: Vi symbolizes our deep integration across the entire automotive value chain and our commitment to continuous innovation.
brandStory.iDescription: The 'i' in ViCAR represents our Intelligent System ‚Äî a comprehensive platform where imported and reconditioned vehicles are seamlessly integrated through cutting-edge technology.
brandStory.iPoint1Text: Data-driven decisions guide our vehicle sourcing: which models to import, optimal pricing strategies, and configurations that meet market demand.
brandStory.iPoint2Text: From global sourcing ‚Üí import ‚Üí reconditioning ‚Üí listing ‚Üí sale ‚Üí mobility services ‚Äî everything operates within one unified ecosystem.
brandStory.iPoint3Text: We practice strategic importing, carefully analyzing market trends, cost structures, and customer preferences to deliver optimal value.
brandStory.iPoint4Text: Transforming traditional vehicle reconditioning into a modern, technology-driven mobility platform.
brandStory.cDescription: Care is our service foundation. Premium mobility extends beyond the vehicle ‚Äî it's about making you feel valued, understood, and truly looked after throughout your journey.
brandStory.cStandard2: Rigorous vehicle maintenance and safety protocols
brandStory.cStandard3: Real-time flight monitoring and proactive schedule adjustments
brandStory.cStandard4: Personalized service tailored to your preferences
brandStory.cStandard5: White-glove VIP service that feels like home
brandStory.cFooter: Care embodies our values: reliability, safety, and trustworthiness in every interaction.
brandStory.aDescription: Access connects you to premium mobility effortlessly. We empower you to travel on your terms ‚Äî anytime, anywhere, with complete control and flexibility.
brandStory.aFeature3: Seamless airport lounge and transfer services
brandStory.aFeature5: Dedicated corporate and business travel solutions
brandStory.rDescription: Ride defines our core experience. Every journey delivers smooth, refined, and reassuring comfort ‚Äî the hallmark of true luxury mobility.
brandStory.rFooter: Every Ride is a journey you'll trust and treasure.
brandStory.value1Desc: Every journey, every service, every vehicle ‚Äî all held to the highest premium standards.
brandStory.value2Desc: Rigorous training, comprehensive vehicle inspections, and VIP-level protocols ensure your complete peace of mind.
brandStory.value3Desc: Customer-centric service with thoughtful, personalized attention from pickup to destination.
brandStory.value4Desc: Seamless instant booking, transparent pricing, and intelligent mobility tools make premium travel effortless.
brandStory.value5Desc: Consistent, reliable, and professional in every interaction ‚Äî this is our commitment to you.
brandStory.subsidiary1: VIP airport transfers, private chauffeur, executive car services
brandStory.subsidiary5: Insurance & extended warranty solutions (ideal for KW99 customers)
brandStory.subsidiary6: Exclusive private tours, island hopping, Northern Malaysia experiences
brandStory.subsidiary7: Enterprise fleet solutions & dedicated driver management
brandStory.ctaSubtitle: Connect with our team today and discover how we elevate every journey.
